projects.title: PrepAhead
projects.description: Founded White Wolf Studio (whitewolfstudio.co.za) to develop PrepAhead, a comprehensive meal planning application designed to simplify weekly kitchen routines. PrepAhead streamlines meal organization, reduces food waste, and enhances the cooking experience through features like a flexible weekly planner, automatically generated smart shopping lists with sharing capabilities, and an integrated recipe collection with adjustable servings.

education.description: Thesis on 'The Design and Implementation of an Intelligent Agent to Play Kriegspiel Chess, an Imperfect Information Game'. Using deep counterfactual regret minimization algorithms to train AI agents.
Project: 'Kriegspiel Chess Game for Information Superiority Demonstration'. Built an engine allowing users to create chess variants with unique pieces, movements, and vision levels.
Foundational computer science education with focus on programming languages, algorithms, and natural language processing.
